lore: During the Unification War, there was a dark lord who surpassed all others in power and evil. Sigmund the Eternal managed to deceive Vertraag to learn the secrets of time, then betrayed him. Or at least he thought he had when he rose up in arms against those who only wanted peace.\n\nStillborn babies become Abyssal Spectres after they are buried, and they are able to consume the life energy of those they touch.
menagerieDialog: (Its baby is crying, but it doesn't seem to care.)
(You can't help but wonder whose baby it's holding. On second thought, you'd rather not know.)
(Its baby begins to cry. It must not like you very much.)
(The baby is screaming for its mother.)
(This is, without a doubt, one of the most disturbing creatures in the world. Personally, you can't imagine ever settling down to have children yourself.)
name: Abyssal Spectre
